task.summary: Default task
Fixes a bug in the FlashScreen activity
Fixes a bug in the Courses activity
Sets a large heap for the application in the manifest file
Fixes bugs with the loading and downloading of the timetable image
Adds dependency for hashing algorithms
Hashes passwords when logging in or signing up
Creates the Results model and its corresponding http method in the interface
Notifies user on a failed attemp to retrieve timetable
Creates the Results activity to retrieve results
Directs user to Results activity when its corresponding button is clicked in Curriculum activity
Improves the downloading of resources (results, timetables)
Creates Token model and sends/updates it to (in) the remote server
Updates the filename for downloaded results
Centralizes the views in the Curriculum activity
Adds the Firebase dependency for app indexing
Sets default Firebase notification icon and color
Sets the current time as the sent time of a notification if the remote time is incorrect
Creates the Transaction activity
Creates a special class to download results
Directs user to Transaction activity when Get Results button is clicked in Results activity
Creates the model that handles the Mobile Money response
Adds API calls for the MoMo transactions
Modifies request timeout values
Reattempts to download results if results server was previously unreachable
Downloads results and redirects user to Home activity when transaction was successfully processed
Implements notification stacking for multiple notifications
Creates the Payment model
Creates the Payment table and its corresponding database methods
Catches scenario of error code response when trying to get results from remote server
Creates post request to add payment to remote server
Creates class responsible for adding payments to the remote server and the local database
Improves commenting in FirebaseMessagingService
Adds payments to the remote server then local database after each successful transaction
Fixes a bug in the Messages activity
Modifies Payment model and its usages
Creates the Payments activity to display transaction history
Launches Payments activity when corresponding item is clicked in navigation drawer from Home activity
Creates the SinglePayment activity to display details of a particular payment
Fixes a bug with the SQL command to create the Payment table
Creates class responsible for downloading timetables
Downloads timetable directly when Timetable button is clicked in Curriculum activity
Notifies user when download of results is complete
Changes MoMo email
Fixes a bug with the date format when saving the Payment transaction
Fixes a bug with the display of the amount in the SinglePayment activity
Uses a ProgressDialog to tell users to wait while their requests are being processed
Adds French translations for the app
Hides the "Forgot your password?" view from the StudentLogin and SubscriberLogin activities
Fixes a bug with notification stacking
